Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which is valued at $8,000. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your specific needs and exceed your expectations. I am confident it will bring immense value to your life or business. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $7,200. This is a special offer designed to ensure you have the chance to experience the unparalleled benefits of our product at a highly favorable rate. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $7,200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $7,200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
